incident_updates.body: Start time : 04/04/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 07/04/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Tank preventive maintenance Hall 3
Start time : 04/04/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 05/04/2022 01:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 04/04/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 04/04/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : Switch off the IPMI switch (Intelligent Platform Management Interface) for about 5 minutes approximatively Service improvement : We are going to switch redundant PDUs (Power Distribution Unit) to other PDUs
The operation has been abandoned, we will keep you in touch if it is postponed.

Summary : We are going to intervene in the rack to replace a large number of power supply cables that could have an insulation defect. Actions : Replacement of the C13/C14 power supply cables of the rack Start of intervention : 04/04/2022 12h30 UTC Rack : S340B04 Impact : None Duration of intervention : 01h30

Start time : 04/04/2022 14:00 UTC End time : 04/04/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We need to activate smaug in singapore by adding new Smaug backbone and converting old sbb.

Start time : 05/04/2022 04:30 UTC End time : 05/04/2022 06:30 UTC Service impact : Interruption of the vrack network during this operation. Service improvement : Replacement of a switch due to multiple untimely reboots.

Start time : 05/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 05/04/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : The UPS will be in bypass mode Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to replace UPS used battery

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.
